description:
This course on SAP Warehouse Management (SAP WM) is a video training course created as a step by step guide to understand SAP WM concepts , SAP WM organisational hierarchy and the configuration steps involved in setting up your first warehouse. 

This is a beginner level course that helps you to have a basic understanding of SAP WM from concept to configuration.You can check the advanced SAP WM professional level course details, additional free training resources on SAP WM and SAP HUM and more details on the course curriculum on my website as well

This course uses the case study methodology as the author walks you through various nodes that you need to configure your own warehouse in SAP. If you wish to further enhance your knowledge on the subject, guidance on study material  and notes is provided at the end of the course.

If you are looking at understanding the basic concepts of SAP Warehouse management along with the configuration but having no knowledge of SAP WM , then this course is definitely for you.
title: SAP Warehouse Management (WM) Training
